Room.Name: Kista Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Kista Avenue, west of the entry to the School of Astrology.
Room.LongDescription: A pink and green door on the west side of the avenue leads into a three story building maintained by the Iilandi University System. Although the building is called the School of Astrology, there are no students there. The University reserves this place as a seminar and conference building for the best minds concerned with astrology.
